## Section 3

```{r chunk_1.3.1}
#| fig-alt: "A sample R plot"
#| fig-cap: "A time series plot in R with alt text"

library(tidyverse)

data <- data.frame(
  day = as.Date("2017-06-14") - 0:364,
  value = runif(365) + seq(-140, 224)^2 / 10000
)

p <- ggplot(data, aes(x=day, y=value)) +
  geom_line() + 
  xlab("")
p
```
